data_io module

data_io.load_data(_data_dir, data_type='train', index=False)
data_io.read_data_file(data_file)
data_io.read_json_file(json_file)
data_io.read_labels_file(labels_file)
data_io.show_data_statistics(data_sets, name='Train')
